version_description:
1) Lists Stickers for iMessages!! With over 40 different stickers to choose from, there are lots of ways to share lists stickers and make your messages more fun!!

2) Allowing Users to Manage Data Stored in iCloud:
• Delete iCloud data
• Export iCloud data
• Turn On/Off iCloud Storage

3) Master Reset Option to delete all data from the app.

Thank you for using Lists To do!! You are awesome :)

New features:
- Change the size of lists
- Settings redesigned

Thank you for using Lists To do!! You are awesome :)

Brand new design, amazing functionalities!!
Explore the new, stunning user experience of Lists To do!!!

- Print a list using AirPrint directly through the app
- Sort the list of lists: manually, alphabetically or by date created

Thank you for using Lists To do!! You are awesome :)

You saw it, you liked it, you wanted it, you got it!! New pack with more than 130 amazing list icons and 37 theme colours to make your lists stand out!!!

- iOS 13 support
- Bug with restore of in-app purchase fixed
Thank you for using Lists To do!! You are awesome :)

Upcoming list items are here!
View now all your upcoming items, based on the reminders you have set, for all your lists combined. Just select the calendar icon in the bottom toolbar of the home screen!

Thank you for using Lists To do!! You are awesome :)

New features:
- Change the size of lists
- Settings redesigned

Thank you for using Lists To do!! You are awesome :)

Dark mode is here!
You can now personalize the appearance of Lists with new skins: Dark mode & Dark Blue ;)

Thank you for using Lists To do!! You are awesome :)

2) Bug for iPads when pressing a tab bar button fixed
